typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		title_by_genre as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:['alter table dbo.movieswithratings add  title_by_genre nvarchar(max);\ndeclare @i nvarchar(max);\nselect @i = STRING_AGG (title, \';\') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY title ASC) FROM dbo.MoviesWithRatings GROUP BY MoviesWithRatings.year\nupdate dbo.MoviesWithRatings set title_by_genre = @i;'],
	mapColumn(
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato} = RottenTomato
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink2
